  1. …in reply to @zachleat
    I think some good criticism I’ve seen from @_developit is that if you’re doing performance benchmarking, *for now* it’s better to run tests against Branch or Permalink deploys instead of Pull Request-based Deploy Previews to avoid perf overhead: docs.netlify.com/site-deploys/overview/#branches-and-deploys
